document_data.caption: A map showing the unforgiving expanse of the Haunted Lands.
document_data.name: Haunted Lands
document_data.mainbody: The '''Haunted Lands''' were the eastern and greater of the two large deserts that dominated the elevated interior of [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Geographical Features:
*[[Furrowed Mountains]] (Jibal al-Hutut)
*[[Ghost Mountains]] (Jibal al-Taif)
*[[Great Anvil]]
*[[Pit of the Laughing Efreeti]]<ref>.
*[[Sea of Salt]]
*[[Genies' Garden|The Genie's Garden]]
document_data.History: After a distant history of opposing kingdoms, the Haunted Lands were only thinly populated by several [[Zakharan pantheon|enlightened]] tribes of nomadic herders (called [[Al-Badia]] in [[Midani]]) and a number of small groups of savage nomads with more sinister trades.
document_data.Rumors and Legends: Writings in a savage language could be found on the walls of the ruins in the Haunted Lands. Some of it was magically deciphered by scholars and identified as the dead language called [[Chun]].

Notable Locations.Ruins:
*[[Moradask]], City of the Sun<ref>
*[[Sokkar]], City of Eternity<ref>

Inhabitants.Major tribes<ref>:
*[[House of Hanif]]
*[[House of Hotek]]
*[[Jann of the Haunted Lands]]
